text: The hotel staff is helpful. Limited choice of breakfast for vegetarians and vegans Rooms are very small compared to the pics also the hotel gave us a twin beds despite us requesting for double bed
A lot of choice for vegans and vegetarians at breakfast and dinner staff was very friendly and nice. Room service could be improved the spa was small and sometimes noisy

Authentic Parisian style with excellent international finish and quality of service Fantastic quiet compact rooms we stayed on 6th floor. Wifi speed is low breakfast choice is limited nogo for vegan or vegetarian
Everything about it. The menu didn t have a good vegetarian vegan option which made it hard for me to have proper meals although the chef did go out of his way to make me something
vegetarian vegan food view from the balcony and talking to the chef Good access for wheelchairs
great room efficient and friendly staff. would like to see more attention to vegan vegetarian health conscious guests at breakfast more natural cereals rice or soy milk organic wholewheat bread etc
Room was clean Complimentary drinks was a good treat each day. Breakfast could have more vegetarian options Also restaurant menu could have more children s options and vegetarian choices
The location was great the views at the restaurant were amazing. They need more vegetarian options for breakfast i e vegetarian sausages etc
Service was impeccable. Restaurants at hotel did not have enough vegetarian options
The choice of food in the cafe. Not much selection of vegetarian in the Savannah restaurant
Excellent property. No choice for a vegetarian meal for dinner at the restaurant
The Four Seasons standard. Expensive and the absence of a breakfast buffet More vegetalian vegan options at the bar restaurants would be much appreciated

A nice location easy walking distance to metro bars restaurants Notre Dame and Jardins Luxembourg Safe provided Room size OK Nice artwork decorations. Limited vegan choice for breakfast no milk alternatives and no fresh fruit
Free upgrade to Suite Clean Excellent service. Lack of vegetarian options in restaurant
Location is excellent. Old hotel breakfast full of pastries only NO vegan gluten free options poor choice of fruits antiquated interiors
Great location ideal for Hyde park concerts Lovely room Good car park would recommend to anyone wanting to go to London. Although breakfast was nice it would be nice to have some vegetarian options
Great breakfast amazing spa facilities good transport links. Not a lot of choice for vegetarians in the restaurants for lunch and dinner
It was neat and clean and staff were helpful and friendly. Way too pricey for the facilities and restaurant didn t have much vegetarian options
The window was open in our room when we arrived early evening it was freezing We had to sleep with the heating on and both woke up with massive a headache No vegetarian option on restaurant menu
Nice hotel with an easy to access from vienna Airport Basic rooms are small but confortable Breakfast is nice with choice for vegan like me Highly recommended
Location was excellent Near the tube and lots of restaurants nearby Clean and spacious rooms. No choice for vegetarians at breakfast and they were not able to help out

The room facilities were excellent and the bed was very comfortable Great shower Very clean Staff very helpful and friendly. No view from window Expected better bread selection from a hotel in Vienna Vegan options limited
Lovely staff great breakfast with lots of choice including vegan croissants and plant based yogurt

The best hotel we stayed so far in Milano Excellent space cleanliness location with many great restaurants within 500m radius one of the best breakfast buffets with vegetarian gluten free options and custom omelet and next to tram station in a green neighborhood
The most comfortable bed in a hotel ever Really friendly and helpful staff Fantastic location for exploring Paris Great breakfast with tons of options including for vegan
Amazing breakfast With many vegan options Great location Super cool decoration lovely staff

Amazing staff who go beyond there normal line of duty Great local shops and restaurants Very close to metro and Eiffel tower. better selection of meals required on menu eg vegetarian Meals were very good but expensive at 22 euros for room service
Great location. Dated decor in rooms overpriced breakfast no vegan friendly options for breakfast
Great location just 15 minutes walk way from railway station museums Some fast food for vegan also restaurants are near the hotel. Hotel is not bad but needed some renovation as for me
room lovely and comfortable bathroom heated floor wonderful. vegan options at breakfast soya milk spread
It is an amazing hotel I loved everything location comfort services friendliness of the staff and vegan options on the menu One of the best hotels I have stayed in Paris will definitely come back
great staff went above the normal great facilities close to tube shops restaurant next door accommodated gluten free vegans. very small rooms
Given a free upgrade Minimal yet luxurious feel to the decor Loved the marble bathroom. Be aware of the restaurant raw vegan food
A very enjoyable stay and lovely staff. I wish there were more vegan options for breakfast other than just fruit
I enjoyed the hospitality of the staff. The hotel need to have more options for vegetarian
The gym. Bad wi fi connection small and uncomfortable bed could not breath from the chlorium smell in the pool no vegan options in breakfast
Cleanliness of room. Lack of Choice of vegetarian options for breakfast
The hotel was in a good location my son liked the space theme Very clean modern and staff very nice. not enough choice on the menu for vegetarians

Staff very helpful and friendly. No vegan breakfast option The private hire cab that was called for us was over expensive and not suitable for us with a wheelchair we would have preferred a black cab as we requested
The staff were very accommodating of our vegan limitations and prepared a wonderful vegan breakfast
The staff were friendly. The choice of hot vegetarian items in the breakfast

Great location very clean and comfortable. Breakfast was soooooooooo basic ZERO options for vegans or people allergic to milk No plant milk lukewarm coffee cheap cereal tiny little rolls and that was it
Near to Metro near to central areas. Limited vegetarian food in restaurant
For breakfast there was absolutly no alternative for vegetarians who do not eat egg or milk products
Excellent service and a breakfast buffet with plenty of choice for a vegetarian Well designed clean rooms
Very nice perfect location with a little fridge and its own gourmet vegetarian restaurant
The bed thebreakfast the friendly and helpful staff cleanliness and decor. Lack of vegetarian choice in the dinner menu
Plenty to eat Very nice food. Non dairy vegetarian options limited
Very friendly Staff Overall Comfort is good. Breakfast needs more Spread Vegetarians have no choice Only Breads and Corn flakes
Comfortable beds. Breakfast could have had more choice in hot food for vegetarians Need a peep hole in all doors
the room was perfect. There was no vegetarian option the range of breads were limited and the bagels were stale
It would be great if the had Gluten Free options and vegetarian sausages

Great location right next door to the Shepherds Bush Empire Very welcoming and friendly staff good food although limited room service options for a vegan after you come back from a gig. Really soft mattress so an uncomfortable nights sleep

Ideal location for our needs VERY helpful staff comfy room lovely bathroom. The room was extremely hot and there were no instruction on how to change it Also the breakfast was a little disappointing there were no vegan options except fruit
Great comfortable rooms Excellent Service Lounge service is good Had nice time. Vegetarian options are limited request you to add more options
Good hotel in a quiet location and a few steps from the dlr and 24hr bus services The staff were welcoming and attentive Room service also had plenty of nice vegetarian options
Awesome location and hospitality. Few more vegetarian options could have been provided in breakfast
Should have some hot breakfast options for vegetarians baked beans hash browns mushrooms etc
The room was really well equipped clean and comfy. No pool at the location restaurant menu isn t vegetarian freindly
We are currently not eating meal the vegetarian selection was excellent There was plenty of choice for both hot cold options. The fruit salad could have had more than just apples pears
